DOC.brief_summary: The study observe whether dexmedetomidine could reduce agitation emergence general anesthesia patient undergoing retroperitoneal laparoscopic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Dexmedetomidine Improve Outcomes During Emergence From Retroperitoneal Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Agitation emergence frequent retroperitoneal urologic surgery . Dexmedetomidine alpha-2 receptor agonist show sedative algesic effect . In study compare effect dexmedetomidine give different protocol emergence agitation .
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule retroperitoneal laparoscopic surgery Patients write informed consent Patients difficulty communication Patients risk obstructive sleep apnea syndrome
